attributes.action: Ban restrictions on natural medication - cannabis etc
attributes.additional_details:
We would like the gov to accept that if a plant can not be patented (as it is natural), then it also can not be illegal. To say nature is illegal is a contradiction to life itself.
We also would like the gov to accept that under human right legislations, it is a offence to prevent, restrict or suppress either the knowledge or use of natural medication.
